briefdescription.para: Sets the LoRa radio to receive mode.
Sets the LoRa radio to transmit mode.
Sets the radio to transmit mode, sends a message string using the LoRa radio and sets the radio back to receive mode.
Decrypts a message string using the AES256 algorythm with the corresponding node key.

simplesect.para: char* an array of characters containing the decrypted message

briefdescription.para: Called every time a new message is received. Filters unwanted messages, decrypts the payload, gets the relevant fields from the payload and sends back an acknowledge message if necessary.

parameterdescription.para: size of the incoming message in bytes

briefdescription.para: Adds to the message queue an uplink message containing sensor data.

detaileddescription.para: Note: The ADC value is a 12-bit number, so the maximum value is 4095 (counting from 0). To convert the ADC integer value to a real voltage youâ€™ll need to divide it by the maximum value of 4095, then double it (note above that Adafruit halves the voltage), then multiply that by the reference voltage of the ESP32 which is 3.3V and then vinally, multiply that again by the ADC Reference Voltage of 1100mV.

parameterdescription.para: value read from the relevant sensor

briefdescription.para: Get a message from the send queue and send it. Implements retransmission in case an acknowledge message is not received. Aware of a failed transmission.

parameterdescription.para: current time in millisenconds since boot

briefdescription.para: Send an uplink message containing the node status.

parameterdescription.para: ID of the status request message

briefdescription.para: Send an acknowledge message confirming the reception of an uplink transmission.

parameterdescription.para: ID of the message being acknowledged

briefdescription.para: Sets the state of the relevant actuator with the relevant value.

parameterdescription.para: value to which the actuator is set to

briefdescription.para: returns the minimum value between two integers

simplesect.para: int the smaller between a and b

briefdescription.para: Header file for the communication protocol library. Contains the used data structures, function declaration and general configuartion options for the library.
